GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Battery, Earphone, Handset, User Manual, Warranty card

Warranty.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the products is limited to manufacturing defects only
Warranty.Warranty Service Type: Customer needs to visit the nearby Authorized Service Center to get the product repired or inspected. Customer Service Number - 1800 - 110 - 400 (Toll Free from BSNL & MTNL), +91 - 9582710400 (Not toll free)
Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 Year manufacturer warranty for the Handset, 6 months manufacturer warranty for other inbox accessories
